net.padlocksoftware.padlock.validator
Class ValidationParameters

java.lang.Object
  net.padlocksoftware.padlock.validator.ValidationParameters

public final class ValidationParameters
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of various parameters to be used by ValidationPlugins when validating a license. This is an immutable class created by a Validator instance to give supplamental information that may help plugins determine whether a license is valid or not.

Author:
Jason Nichols (jason@padlocksoftware.net)

Method Detail

createParameters

protected static ValidationParameters createParameters(boolean ignoreFloatTime,
                                                       java.util.Date validationDate,
                                                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> blacklist)

getIgnoreFloatTime

public boolean getIgnoreFloatTime()
Get the status of the IgnoreFloatTime flag. When true, the validator will not attempt to validate the floating expiration field on a license. This is useful for company side validation routines, which may want to verify a customer license.

getValidationDate

public java.util.Date getValidationDate()
Get the date that the validation process was initiated.

getBlacklist

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getBlacklist()
Get the list of blacklisted license signatures to compare the current license against.

Returns:
The list of blacklisted license signatures, or an empty list if this Validator has not been given a blacklist.
